item.title: Deploy blog written with org-mode on GitHub Pages
item.description: Table of Contents Context Goal (expected final workflow) Steps Create GitHub repository Upload Hugo configuration Create GitHub Action workflow Conclusion Context I have been using emacs to write in org-mode for some time now. I love it. So, I decided to start writing a personal blog with it. However, I did not have the tool to create the blog and the means to publish it. I selected a static site generator (SSG) called Hugo for my first problem.
